sentences: During informal consultations, delegates agreed on short-term measures, including encouraging the Executive Secretary to implement Decision 9/CMP.2 and encouraging parties, where feasible, to provide adequate protection for individuals serving on constituted bodies established under the Kyoto Protocol, until appropriate treaty provisions come into force.
On long-term measures, delegates agreed on text to be included in a draft decision on the second review of the Protocol under Article 9.
The text would require the SBI to prepare appropriate treaty arrangements for privileges and immunities for consideration at COP/MOP 5.
It would further agree that Article 6 of the Convention on the Privileges and Immunities of the United Nations should serve as a basis for the development of appropriate treaty provisions.
